colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA RGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS BYUNG BA LA LEN PA 'DI NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LA CUNG ZAD RGYAS NAS BGYIS ZHES AER TE NI DZA' SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA NAN TAN GYIS YANG DANG YANG DU BSKUL BA'I NGOR MCHOG GYUR SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PANTI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL PA BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
